DOC.brief_summary: This study aim exploratively assess efficacy safety hydrophilic polyurethane foam dressing ( MedifoamⓇ BetafoamⓇ ) pressure ulcer specifically . The target enrolment 20 patient , 10 patient per arm .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety MedifoamⓇ BetafoamⓇ Pressure Ulcer
DOC.detailed_description: As primary objective , percentage completely heal patient time complete healing assess apply study device , MedifoamⓇ BetafoamⓇ , 12 week pressure ulcer patient . In addition , pressure ulcer size reduction rate 12 week evaluate . Patients make weekly site visit . There 14 visit total , include screen visit 14 day ( maximum ) baseline visit .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults age least 19 year old consent date 2 . Pressure ulcer National Pressure Ulcer Advisory Panel ( NPUAP ) Stage III screen 3 . Pressure ulcer size 310 cm2 screen 4 . Written consent provide subject representative 1 . Any study ulcer NPUAP Stage I , II IV 2 . Diabetic ulcer venous ulcer ( stasis ulcer ) 3 . Past history surgical treatment within 1 year irradiation target pressure ulcer within 1 year 4 . Hypersensitivity reaction product povidone iodine 5 . Hyperthyroidism thyroid disorder require drug treatment 6 . Signs current underlie systemic infection ( sepsis/bacterial infection/tuberculosis ) cellulitis osteomyelitis 7 . Type 1 diabetes 8 . Current malnutrition 9 . Heavy smoker : Current smoking level ≥1 pack ( 20 cigarette ) /day tobacco 10 . Drug alcohol addiction 11 . Requirement immunesuppressants study , current chemotherapy radiotherapy 12 . Application investigational product/medical device within 1 month prior investigational device application 13 . Pregnant breastfeed woman 14 . Other renal , hepatic , neurological immunological disorder may interfere wind heal process , discretion Investigator
